Question
========
Which of the following statements about the R system for statistical computing best describes your experience with R?

Answerlist
----------
* I have never heard of R.
* I have seen R but haven't used it (much).
* I have already used R for some tasks.


Solution
========
R is a programming language and free software environment for statistical computing and graphics.
More details and links can be found on the official web page at <https://www.R-project.org/>.
